feed.title: Woolly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency @babel/runtime-corejs3 to v7.25.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4993
  • Upgrade yarn version to 4 by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5016
  • Update dependency sass to v1.77.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4995
  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.10.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4996
  • Update dependency eslint to v9.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4997
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to v7.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4998
  • Update dependency tailwindcss to v3.4.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4999
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v7.18.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5000
  • Update dependency @types/node to v20.16.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5002
  • Update dependency dayjs to v1.11.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5004
  • Update dependency typescript to v5.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5008
  • Update dependency postcss to v8.4.41 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5010
  • Update dependency autoprefixer to v10.4.20 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5017
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5018
  • Update dependency electron to v31.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5001
  • Update dependency @babel/runtime-corejs3 to v7.25.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5019
  • Update dependency @electron/notarize to v2.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5020
  • Update dependency @types/sanitize-html to v2.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5021
  • Update dependency react-icons to v5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5022
  • Update flakpak xml for 6.1.3 by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5024
  • Handle click in notification by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5025
  • Show followed tags in the sidebar by @nileshtrivedi in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5028
  • Some styling improvements by @nileshtrivedi in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5029
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5007
  • refs #4754 Add follow/unfollow tag button by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5032
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5037

New Contributors

  • @nileshtrivedi made their first contribution in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.1.3...v6.1.4

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refs #4794 Add proxy settings by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5045

  • Update dependency react-hotkeys-hook to v4.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5031
  • Update dependency postcss to v8.4.45 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5027
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to v7.35.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5033

  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v8.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5047
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5039
  • Update dependency @types/node to v20.16.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5030
  • Update dependency @material-tailwind/react to v2.1.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4837

  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5055

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.8
